abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can't be used if Uxie is affected by a Special Condition. You can't use more than 1 Trade Off Pok√©-Power each turn.

effect.en: Uxie can't use Zen Blade during your next turn.
